abstract: Italian police search for suspects in riot that caused millions of dollars of damage and injured 135 people in downtown Rome.
snippet: Italian police searched for suspects on Monday in the riot that caused millions of dollars of damage and injured 135 people in downtown Rome during the weekend.
lead_paragraph: Italian police searched for suspects on Monday in the riot that caused millions of dollars of damage and injured 135 people in downtown Rome during the weekend.

headline.main: Italy: Hundreds of Raids, but No Arrests
headline.print_headline: Italy: Hundreds of Raids, but No Arrests
headline.seo: Hundreds of Raids, but No Arrests in Italy
